title: Animated screensavers are coming to Chromebooks with Chrome OS 100
content:
Chrome OS has a long way to go before it can match Windows and macOS, but it’s doing a whole lot better than it was. It constantly gets new features and improvements, and Chrome OS 100 is the latest version available in the developer channel of releases. While each iteration of the platform generally brings

The post Animated screensavers are coming to Chromebooks with Chrome OS 100 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google has rolled out animated screensavers for Chromebooks running Chrome OS 100, with potential for more to be added in the future.
